entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 21.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 early this afternoon. High minus 21. Wind chill near minus 36. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Wednesday 26 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow and blowing snow. Temperature rising to minus 14 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow and blowing snow beginning this evening. Amount 2 cm. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature rising to minus 14 by morning. Wind chill minus 35 this evening and minus 25 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Wednesday 26 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Snow and blowing snow. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Snow ending in the morning then mainly cloudy. Blowing snow early in the morning. Wind southeast 40 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 25 in the morning and minus 14 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Wednesday 26 April 2023
